item.title: Proxmox with OpenTofu Kubespray and Kubernetes
item.description: In this post I will quickly go through how I made use of OpenTofu to provision VMs on my Proxmox cluster and Ansible using Kubespray to deploy my Kubernetes clusters on demand.
